fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.libpst

Class LPMailBoxMessage

  • Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.core.MailBoxMessage
      • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.libpst.LPMailBoxMessage

  • public class LPMailBoxMessage
extends MailBoxMessage
    MailBoxMessage sub-class for mail boxes extracted through libpst library.

    The java-libpst is a pure java library for the reading of Outlook PST and OST files.

    This library was originally based off the documentation created through the fantastic reverse engineering effort made by the [libpff](https://sourceforge.net/projects/libpff) project. The library has been improved with information provided by the release of the official PST specs by Microsoft.

    Thanks to Richard Johnson http://github.com/rjohnsondev

    • Method Detail

      • analyzeMessage

        public void analyzeMessage()
                    throws ExtractionException
        Description copied from class: MailBoxMessage
        Analyze message to collect metadata and content information (protocol specific).

        This is the main method for sub classes, where all metadata and information has to be extracted in standard representation out of the inner representation of the message.

        Specified by:
        analyzeMessage in class MailBoxMessage
        Throws:
        ExtractionException - Any unrecoverable extraction exception (access trouble, major format problems...)
